info.title: AvePoint Cloud Governance
info.description: Automate provisioning, management, and lifecycle for Teams, Groups, Communities, and Sites.  Connect to AvePoint Cloud Governance to execute additional actions in Microsoft 365 such as creation of new content, add users, and update information in lists.

get.description: Get service names by specific type.
Retrieve a list of workspaces managed by Cloud Governance.

parameters.name: primaryContact
parameters.description: Filter by the primary workspace contact.

parameters.name: urlorIdorEmail
parameters.description: Filter by the workspace URL or email address.

parameters.name: secondaryContact
parameters.description: Filter by the secondary workspace contact.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Number of workspaces to retrieve (default = 2000, maximum = 3000).

parameters.name: nextLink
parameters.description: Use the next token to retrieve remaining workspaces that have not been listed here.
